main event: On April 30, 1964, an alleged landing of a UFO similar to the Socorro incident was reported, but investigators deemed it a hoax perpetrated by local children imitating the earlier sighting.
interesting points: The UFO was described as similar to the Socorro landing,The case was believed to be a prank by children who recreated the marks made during the Socorro incident,Investigating officials found no substantial evidence to back the sighting,Comments indicated that there were many reports of unusual phenomena during that timeframe,The sighting drew attention from multiple individuals and became a local sensation.
witness description: Incident was deemed a hoax by officials and witnesses were children reportedly involved in the prank.
